title: Birthday Wishes for Mr. Clearview, James Montalbano
content:
Hey, pretty nice! You could say it's a reminder that the days of "Highway Gothic" are numbered, thanks to James's great work (not to mention his patience with bureaucracy).   
   
Oh, and Happy Birthday too!   
   
hhp
author: hrant

comments.content:
Thank you all for your good wishes.   
   
James

A belated happy birthday, James.   
   
(\*sigh\* A day late and a dollar short. A lower back injury has kept me out of commission and straggling behind.)   
   
Hope your day was a wonderful celebration.   
   
-- K.

Happy birthday!   
   
 ![future drivers](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516051308im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/35802.gif)   
   
The drivers of America salute you.

I must've messed up my post yesterday . . .   
   
Happy belated James!   
   
Stuart :D

Happy Birthweek!   
   
Alfon you later (sorry, wrong thread.)

Friggin' cool car Mr. Chris Rugen! :-)   
I am glad to know you, Mr. James Montalbano,   
yes, funny, nappy & creative birthtimes!

I think I built a model of that car when I was a kid!   
   
Thank you for all the birthday wishes.   
   
And there does appear to be a hint of movement by the Feds on Clearview adoption, but I have heard that before, so I am not holding my breath. (though I have gotten quite good at it over these last ten years)
